meanings.definition: The position or rank of a captain.
meanings.sent1: In the soccer team, the captaincy is given to the player with the most experience.
meanings.sent2: She was proud to take on the captaincy of the ship and lead the crew.
meanings.sent3: The captaincy of the school debate team was like being the leader of a small army.
meanings.sent4: His captaincy of the chess club was akin to being the king on the board, making strategic moves.
meanings.sent5: The captaincy of the basketball team was a badge of honor, showing his dedication and skill.

meanings.definition: The authority or leadership of a captain.
meanings.sent1: Under his captaincy, the team worked together efficiently and achieved victory.
meanings.sent2: Her strong captaincy inspired the crew to face challenges with courage.
meanings.sent3: The captaincy of the cooking club meant she was in charge of all the delicious recipes.
meanings.sent4: His captaincy of the debate team was like being the speaker of the house, guiding discussions.
meanings.sent5: The captaincy of the drama club brought out her natural talent for leading and organizing performances.
